block.p: * Jed Bernstein was named to the new position of senior vice president and account group head on the I.B.M. account at Wells Rich Greene BDDP, New York. He was previously a senior vice president and director of new business at Ally & Gargano, New York. * Thomas Nelson, senior vice president and associate creative director at Ammirati & Puris, New York, was named to the new position of chairman and creative director at Ammirati & Puris Canada, Toronto, a full-service office being opened in September to serve clients like United Parcel Service and Compaq Computer.

* Jed Bernstein was named to the new position of senior vice president and account group head on the I.B.M. account at Wells Rich Greene BDDP, New York. He was previously a senior vice president and director of new business at Ally & Gargano, New York. * Thomas Nelson, senior vice president and associate creative director at Ammirati & Puris, New York, was named to the new position of chairman and creative director at Ammirati & Puris Canada, Toronto, a full-service office being opened in September to serve clients like United Parcel Service and Compaq Computer.

* David Sia was named chairman and chief executive of the BBDO Asia/ Pacific region at BBDO Worldwide, New York, succeeding Arthur Sturgess, who left. Mr. Sia was previously an executive vice president and regional director for Southeast Asia at Dentsu, Young & Rubicam, Bangkok. * Robert Solomon was named to the new position of executive vice president and managing director of the direct marketing group at Ammirati & Puris, New York. He previously headed FCB Direct West, of San Francisco and Los Angeles, as the senior vice president and managing director. * John Huppertz was named president of Eric Mower & Associates Marketing and Research Services, Rochester, a new unit of Eric Mower & Associates Inc., Syracuse. He was previously the president and chief operating officer at the agency's Rochester office. * Robert S. Olive was named to the new position of director of business development at Dweck & Campbell, New York. He was previously the president of O.& A. Communications, New York, which closed; Rene Aussoleil, Mr. Olive's former partner at O.& A., is now freelancing. * George Halvorson was named to the new position of senior vice president and group creative director at Foote, Cone & Belding, Chicago. He was previously an executive vice president and group creative director at CME KHBB Advertising, Minneapolis.
